attributes.action: Make the UK the world's first neutral nuclear power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain would benefit financially and attract less terrorism and international displeasure in general if we stopped pretending to be a superpower and, like the Swiss, adopted a position of total neutrality. Let us maintain conventional armed forces sufficient for our needs, and, together with our nuclear deterrent, become the world's first totally neutral  nuclear power
